text: avarkalutaiya narkuli, avarkalutaiya iraivanitattilulla atnu ennum cuvarkkac colaikalakum. Avarrin kile arukal otikkontu irukkum; avarril avarkal enrenrum tankiyirupparkal; allahvum avarkalaip parri, tirupti ataivan, avarkalum avanaipparri tirupti ataivarkal; tan iraivanukkup payappatukirare attakaiyavarukke inta melana nilai untakum
